processing.text: if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@@admin, @@userID, 'GNApprovalIndicator', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end declare @message nvarchar(4000), @q nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @irregular nvarchar(4000), @irregularChars varchar(128), @field varchar(32), @r int select @irregularChars = &IrregularValue; select @irregular = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell có chứa các ký tự: ' + @irregularChars else 'The value of cell %invalidCell contains any of the following characters: ' + @irregularChars end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'Giá trị tại ô %invalidCell đã có hoặc lồng nhau.' else 'The value of cell %invalidCell is invalid or already exists.' end -- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join gndmttcttg b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.u_status = b.u_status -- Checking if @$mode = 1 begin &IrregularMessage; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'u_status', stt, @message from @@table where u_status like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%' &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'u_status', @r = min(stt) from @@table where u_status like '%[' + @irregularChars + ']%'&Irregular; end &Checking; &EndErrorMode; -- Gather select a.* into #k from @@table a join gndmttcttg b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.u_status = b.u_status and b.xtype = 'U' delete @@table from @@table a join #k b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.u_status = b.u_status delete @@table from @@table a join gndmttcttg b on a.loai_duyet = b.loai_duyet and a.u_status = b.u_status and b.xtype = 'S' -- Insert &Inserting; -- Update if @type = '1' begin &Updating; end
